text:
Hello everyone 

Any one have idea about how we can add product other details inside the email which is seen inside the snapshot below? You can refer this document also.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/add-a-product-module-to-your-marketing-email|https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/add-a-product-module-to-your-marketing-email>

If you have any idea about how we can get other property of products inside email then inform me.

Thank you!
